scripts.start: cross-env REACT_APP_SECRET_TYPE=local REACT_APP_CHAT_TYPE=agent REACT_APP_SECRET_ENV=development  react-scripts start
scripts.startFromMember: cross-env REACT_APP_SECRET_TYPE=local REACT_APP_CHAT_TYPE=member REACT_APP_SECRET_ENV=development  react-scripts start
scripts.build: cross-env REACT_APP_SECRET_TYPE=sandbox REACT_APP_CHAT_TYPE=agent REACT_APP_SECRET_ENV=development react-scripts build
scripts.playerBuild: cross-env REACT_APP_SECRET_TYPE=sandbox REACT_APP_CHAT_TYPE=member REACT_APP_SECRET_ENV=development react-scripts build
scripts.allDeploy: npm run playerDeploy && npm run backDeploy
